casebody.data:
Ralph Esposito et al. v. Daniel V. Presnick Daniel V. Presnick v. Ralph Esposito et al. (10083)

Daly, Lavery and Landau, Js.

Argued December 9 decision released December 31, 1991 *928Daniel V. Presnick, pro se, the appellant (defendant in the first case, plaintiff in the second case). JohnR. Williams, for the appellees (plaintiffs in the first case, defendants in the second case). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
